description:
Lightweight and soft, the Rosa backpacking boots are packed with comfort features so you can focus on your natural surroundings while in the backcountry. Elastic gussets and soft fabric collars hold your feet securely and comfortably in place, and the Gore-Tex booties provide waterproofness with breathability.

  • Perwanger® leather uppers have a Hydrobloc® finish for water-resistance and durability
  • Waterproof-breathable GORE-TEX® membrane is thermo-sealed into a bootie, fixed to the upper and glued to the midsole
  • Cushioned collars are comfortable around your ankles
  • Full rand for greater durability in high-wear areas
  • EVA midsoles for stability and comfort
  • Vibram® Star Trek rubber outsoles excel in steep technical terrain for grip and braking
name: Zamberlan 2094 Rosa Gore-Tex Backpacking Boots - Women's
